entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Snow at times mixed with rain this morning. Risk of freezing rain this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
